metadata.synopsis: A birthday dwarf is brought by his friend to Sharess Caress. The idea of celebrating his majority in a pleasure house has left said dwarf quite sour, for more than one reason. This is the dwarf's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 6; 50; 84- talk to the dwarf

0.speaker: Hakeem
0.text: I can't believe I'm outside a brothel. What if my mother finds out? Gods above.

1.speaker: Hakeem
1.text: People are just walking into Sharess' Caress - like it was any old business! No disrespect to you, of course, if you're a, ah, patron.
